summary: The romantic story of Hungarian pianist Franz Liszt (Sir Dirk Bogarde), whose scandalous love affair forced him to abandon his adoring audiences.
cast: Dirk Bogarde|Capucine|Geneviève Page|Patricia Morison|Ivan Desny|Martita Hunt|Lou Jacobi|Albert Rueprecht|Marcel Dalio|Lyndon Brook|Walter Rilla|Hans Unterkircher|Erland Erlandsen|Alexander Davion|Katherine Squire|Robert Warwick|Felix Dvorak|Bess Flowers|Ray Foster|Lester Matthews|Abraham Sofaer|Leola Wendorff
title: Sueño de amor
